items.sentence: I told Tom that I never wanted to do that again.
Mary isn\'t my girlfriend. She\'s just a friend.
Tom couldn\'t make both ends meet on his income.
Tom couldn\'t make himself understood in French.
Tom couldn\'t quite make out what the sign said.
Tom couldn\'t remember what he was going to say.
They scraped barnacles off the hull of the ship.
Things are worse today than they were yesterday.
This is a lot harder than I thought it would be.
We have another ten miles to walk before sunset.
We have to find a new market for these products.
We need to remember to send Tom a birthday card.
We pigged out on pizza and chicken at lunchtime.
We watched the sun setting behind the mountains.
Tom often uses humor to defuse tense situations.
Tom opened the window and let in some fresh air.
Tom picked up the glass of juice and took a sip.
Tom picked up the telephone and started dialing.
Tom plays tennis after school three days a week.
Tom still hasn\'t taken down his Christmas tree.
